code: import React from"react";import{Link}from"react-router-dom";import{Folder,Clock,Settings}from"lucide-react";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function Sidebar(){const links=[{to:"/user-dashboard",label:"My Files",icon:Folder},{to:"/history",label:"History",icon:Clock},{to:"/settings",label:"Settings",icon:Settings}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("aside",{className:"w-64 bg-[#D9E9CF] border-r border-[#B6CEB4] shadow-md p-4 flex flex-col",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-xl font-bold text-[#2F3E27] mb-6",children:"User Menu"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("nav",{className:"flex flex-col gap-3",children:links.map(_ref=>{let{to,label,icon:Icon}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Link,{to:to,className:"flex items-center gap-3 text-[#2F3E27] hover:bg-[#B6CEB4] hover:text-[#2F3E27] p-2 rounded-lg transition",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Icon,{className:"w-5 h-5 text-[#5B7C56]"}),label]},to);})})]});}
